news.title: Why Tesla Stock Was Sliding Today
news.content: Shares of Tesla ( NASDAQ: TSLA ) were heading lower on reports that the Trump administration planned to eliminate the $7,500 electric vehicle ( EV ) tax credit. Tesla also issued its sixth recall this year for the Cybertruck, this time over a faulty drive inverter component.The stock closed down ...

news.title: Trump Plans To Erase EV Tax Credit: Tesla Analyst Says It's 'Net Bullish,' Calls Sell-Off 'Wrong Knee-Jerk Reaction' - Tesla  ( NASDAQ:TSLA )
news.content: Tesla Inc TSLA shares are moving lower Thursday following reports that president-elect Donald Trump plans to get rid of consumer tax credits for EVs. Wedbush analyst Dan Ives believes the cuts are actually net positive for Tesla.

news.title: Trump to Sunset EV Tax Credit: Should Tesla Investors Be Worried?
news.content: Tesla shares fell Thursday after news broke that the incoming Trump administration will seek to remove EV tax credits. However, the news was already priced into the stock and there are several reasons for investors to remain bullish into next year.

news.title: If Tesla Stock Hits All-Time Highs In 2025, Will It Be Driven By Trump-Musk Relationship? Readers Say This - Tesla  ( NASDAQ:TSLA )
news.content: Tesla Inc TSLA has soared since Donald Trump won the 2024 presidential election and Benzinga readers think that the momentum could carry into 2025 for the electric vehicle company. What Happened: Tesla CEO Elon Musk endorsed Trump for president in the 2024 election and helped campaign for his ...

news.title: Space ETFs Soar on Rocket Lab's Q3 Earnings Beat and New Deal
news.content: Shares of Rocket Lab surged over 40% on Wednesday, driven by upbeat earnings and a new deal, benefiting space ETFs.
